nodes.text: The Lost Prince: A Droid Adventure
The Lost Prince: A Droid Adventure is a 1985 children's book adaptation of the Star Wars Droids episode entitled "The Lost Prince". It was written by Ellen Weiss and illustrated by Amador.
An American children's story: R2-D2 and C-3PO find a new master and adventure with a lost prince in dangerous mines.
The Lost Prince is an adaptation of the Star Wars Droids episode of the same name, which was written by Peter Sauder.
